Profile.Upload: Upload an image that you want to use in your profile!

Validation.Company: Company name should be at least 2 characters
Validation.LettersDigits: Only letters and digits are allowed

Navigation.404: Oops. This page does not exist.

Home.SaveText: If you want to save money, this website will be perfect for you!
Home.ControlText: Control your budget with the help of convenient tools
Home.TrackText: Analyze how much money you spent on different categories
Home.TitleDesc: An effective solution to manage your finances!

About.Text1Text: XPense is a website for tracking your finances. Simple, convenient, and effective, this website will help you manage your budget and analyze how much you spend on categories that you have chosen!
About.Text2Title: Tools That Will Help You See Your Expenses
About.Text2Text: Enjoy a wide diversity of tools that will help you see how much money you have spend over the last months. Check out individual categories or overall status of your wallet. Look how much money other members of your wallet have spent! Enjoy a simple but informative diagrams and charts.
About.Text3Text: Whether you want to see how much your family spends or find out what part of your life requires the most money, XPense is going to help you a lot!

Registration.Fill: Please, fill out the registration form
Registration.Please: Please, enter your username and password
Registration.Why: Why Do You Need To Use XPense?
Registration.Expl1: XPense can help you with your everyday expenses. Most of people have no idea how much they spend on various products and services. If you are intersted in learning about your spending habits, XPense will help you a lot!
Registration.Expl2: If you want to save up and need to make sure that you spend less to keep within budget - XPense will help you achieve that! Establish a budget and get notifications when you reach a certain stage!
Registration.Expl3: If you want to change your lifestyle and forget about loans and living on tick, XPense has a great section with tips that will help you understand how to balance your expenses!

NoWallet.CreateWalletText: Become your own wallet owner. Add expenses, invite family members, and find out how much you spend!
NoWallet.CheckInvText: Here, you can look whether other users have invited you to join their wallets!
NoWallet.SendReqText: If you want to join your friend's or family's wallets, choose this option and send a request to the owner of the wallet! You do that by entering user's name.
NoWallet.TipForCreate: You need to choose from 5 to 10 categories for the wallet. After confirming, you will need to log in once more

Validation.TitleMin: Title should be at least 4 characters
Validation.TitleMax: Title should be no longer than 16 characters
Validation.WalletMin: Wallet title  should be at least 2 characters
Validation.WalletMax: Wallet title  should be no longer 16 characters
Validation.DescMin: Description should be at least 4 characters
Validation.DescMax: Description should be no longer than 20 characters
Validation.UserMin: Username should be at least 4 characters
Validation.UserMax: Username should be no longer than 10 characters
Validation.PassMin: Password should be at least 4 characters
Validation.PassMax: Password should be no longer than 8 characters
Validation.PassVal: You need to have at least 1 letter and number

HomeWallet.a: This is a home page. To start using your wallet, please check out the left side of the screen.
HomeWallet.b: To go to your wallet, select Your Wallet section. You can create an expense in the Your Wallet section. Wallet statistics will be shown only if you have at least one expense created.
HomeWallet.c: User statistics will show you your page with your expenses
HomeWallet.d: If you have several users in the wallet, you can find their expenses in the Wallet Statistics - just press the User icon and you will see their expenses.
HomeWallet.e: Categories section can help you look how much you have spent in particular category.
HomeWallet.g: You can edit your profile in the Profile Page - upload a photo or fill out personal info
HomeWallet.h: If you want to add new members to your wallet, you have to be wallet's admin. You will see Admin section in the sidebar.
HomeWallet.k: Click the cogwheel and you will find settings for the site. You can change language and theme.
HomeWallet.l: Section with tips contains useful information for developing better spending habits.
HomeWallet.m: Texts under certain sections and cards are static - I just haven't decided what to use :)
HomeWallet.p: To change theme, click on Sun or Moon. the text will be later

Footer.Last6: Dynamic of your expenses over 6 months
Footer.ExpComp: See changes in your spending habits
